comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of senior citizens employed and y be the number of young adults employed. Both x and y are non-negative integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": "1. 500x + 750y \leq 30000, 
                    2. x + y \geq 50, 
                    3. y \geq 10, 
                    4. y \geq 1/3 * x",
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize Z = 500x + 750y"
}
